com.apstrata.client.android.connection
Class UserConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.apstrata.client.android.connection.UserConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connection
public class UserConnection
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connection

this is the Connection implementation that generates request signatures using a user name and password, hence its name, UserConnection.

Constructor Detail

UserConnection

public UserConnection(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                      java.lang.String accKey,
                      java.lang.String userName,
                      java.lang.String userPassword)
               throws java.lang.Exception
Parameters:
baseUrl - identifies the scheme and the apstrata server that is targeted. Ex: "https://sandbox.apstrata.com/"
accKey - identifies the customer account
userName - is the user login
userPassword - is the user password
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if unable to instantiate a MessageDigest that utilizes MD5

builds a simple request signature corresponding to the combination of the request's action, text parameters and file parameters (for file upload requests)
